targets.query:
from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meterInW" or r["_field"] == "meterOutW")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r.meterInW - r.meterOutW,_time: r._time, _field:"Energiefluss"}))
  |> last()

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "generatorW")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "batdischargeW" or r["_field"] == "batchargeW")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r.batdischargeW -r.batchargeW,_time: r._time, _field:"Batterieladung"}))
  |> last()

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "consumptW")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "generatorW")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "batSOC")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  //|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "generatedWh" or r["_field"] == "exportedWh"  or r["_field"] == "importedWh" or r["_field"] == "batchargeWh" or r["_field"] == "batdischargeWh")
  |> difference()
  |> sum()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with PV: (r.generatedWh -r.exportedWh - r.batchargeWh ) / 
           (r.generatedWh -r.exportedWh + r.importedWh - r.batchargeWh + r.batdischargeWh)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["PV"])
 // |> yield(name: "PV")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  //|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "generatedWh" or r["_field"] == "exportedWh"  or r["_field"] == "importedWh" or r["_field"] == "batchargeWh" or r["_field"] == "batdischargeWh")
  |> difference()
  |> sum()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with Batterie: r.batdischargeWh  / 
           (r.generatedWh -r.exportedWh + r.importedWh - r.batchargeWh + r.batdischargeWh)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["Batterie"])
  |> yield(name: "Batterie")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  //|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "generatedWh" or r["_field"] == "exportedWh"  or r["_field"] == "importedWh" or r["_field"] == "batchargeWh" or r["_field"] == "batdischargeWh")
  |> difference()
  |> sum()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with Netz: r.importedWh  / 
           (r.generatedWh -r.exportedWh + r.importedWh - r.batchargeWh + r.batdischargeWh)}))
  |> keep(columns: ["Netz"])
  |> yield(name: "Netz")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pv-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "powerA" or r["_field"] == "powerB") 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pv-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "powerB" or r["_field"] == "powerA") 
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.powerA + r.powerB, _time: r._time}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Power Ost + Süd"})
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meterInW" or r["_field"] == "meterOutW" 
       or r["_field"] == "batchargeW" or r["_field"] == "batdischargeW")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "power-stats" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>   r["_field"] == "generatorW" or r["_field"] == "meterOutW" or r["_field"] == "batchargeW" )
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: (r.generatorW - r.meterOutW -r.batchargeW) , _time: r._time, _field: "direktverbrauch"})) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value"] )
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "generatorW" or r["_field"] == "meterOutW" or r["_field"] == "batchargeW")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r.generatorW -r.meterOutW -r.batchargeW,_time: r._time, _field: "PV"})) 
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meterInW"  or r["_field"] == "batdischargeW")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

powerDC =
from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "pv-stats" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "powerA" or r["_field"] == "powerB" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _measurement:"power-stats"}))

powerAC = 
from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "power-stats" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_field"] == "generatorW" )
union(tables: [powerDC, powerAC])
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first, createEmpty: false)
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with efficiency: if  r.generatorW > (r.powerA + r.powerB)  then 97.0 else r.generatorW / (r.powerA + r.powerB) * 100.0 , _time: r._time, _field: "efficiency"})) 
|> keep(columns: ["_time","efficiency"] )

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "power-stats" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>   r["_field"] == "batdischargeW" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -1.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first, createEmpty: false)
  //|> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "power-stats" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>   r["_field"] == "meterOutW" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "power-stats" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>   r["_field"] == "meterInW" )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -1.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first, createEmpty: false)
//|> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "power-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "batSOC")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")

data = from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: date.add(d: -7d, to: today()), stop: date.truncate(t: today(), unit: 1d))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "energy-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "exportedWh"  or r._field == "importedWh")
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement"])

exportedWh = data |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r.exportedWh, _time: r._time, _field: "exportedWh" }))
importedWh = data |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: - r.importedWh, _time: r._time, _field: "importedWh" }))


union(tables: [exportedWh, importedWh])
  |> group(columns:["_field"])

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")
from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  //|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> range(start: date.add(d: -7d, to: today()), stop: date.truncate(t: today(), unit: 1d))
  //|> range(start: -7d, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "generatedWh" or r["_field"] == "exportedWh" or r["_field"] == "batchargeWh" 
     or r["_field"] == "batdischargeWh" or r["_field"] == "exportedWh" or  r["_field"] == "priceIn" or  r["_field"] == "priceOut")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (r.generatedWh -r.exportedWh -r.batchargeWh + r.batdischargeWh) / 1000. * r.priceIn + r.exportedWh/1000.0 * r.priceOut}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value","_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  // |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: spread, createEmpty: false)
  //|> aggregateWindow(every: 1w, offset: -3d, fn: sum)
 |> difference()

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")
from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  //|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 // |> range(start: -7d, stop: now())
 |> range(start: date.add(d: -7d, to: today()), stop: date.truncate(t: today(), unit: 1d))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "importedWh"  or  r["_field"] == "priceIn")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with Kosten: (r.importedWh) / 1000. * - r.priceIn}))
  |> keep(columns: ["Kosten","_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: true, column: "Kosten")
  |> difference(columns: ["Kosten"]) 
  //|> keep(columns: ["Kosten"])

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Berlin")
from(bucket: "PV-Anlage")
  |> range(start: date.add(d: -7d, to: today()), stop: date.truncate(t: today(), unit:1d))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "energy-stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "generatedWh" )
  |> difference()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: true, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","_measurement"])
